description: PackageBundleController is the Schema for the packagebundlecontroller API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: PackageBundleControllerSpec defines the desired state of PackageBundleController.

activeBundle.description: ActiveBundle is name of the bundle from which packages should be sourced.

bundleRepository.description: Repository portion of an OCI address to the bundle

createNamespace.description: Allow target namespace creation by the controller

defaultRegistry.description: DefaultRegistry for pulling helm charts and the bundle

logLevel.description: LogLevel controls the verbosity of logging in the controller.

privateRegistry.description: PrivateRegistry is the registry being used for all images, charts and bundles

upgradeCheckInterval.description:
UpgradeCheckInterval is the time between upgrade checks. 
 The format is that of time's ParseDuration.

upgradeCheckShortInterval.description:
UpgradeCheckShortInterval time between upgrade checks if there is a problem. 
 The format is that of time's ParseDuration.
